entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
